title: Heavy Equipment Careers in Georgia | Yancey
text: Since 1914 Yancey has proudly served Georgia by providing superior products, parts and service solutions. As the authorized Caterpillar equipment dealer for Georgia, we offer a wide variety of products and services for new and used heavy and compact construction equipment, rental equipment and power generation. We also provide service and support for all makes and models of on-highway trucks and are the Blue Bird Bus dealer for Georgia. For more than 100 years we have remained committed to learning more about our customers and offering equipment and services to keep up with their changing needs, by leveraging our greatest assets…our employees. Are you ready to be a part of something big? To have endless opportunities, job security, and a rewarding career you can be proud of? Yancey is looking for hardworking, dedicated and skilled employees to join our team. We have full and part-time positions available at numerous locations throughout Georgia. If you’re a veteran or family of a veteran, click the application relevant to you. EEO Statement: Yancey is an equal employment opportunity employer and considers all applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, or any other characteristic protected by state or federal law.
